main event: A soldier observed a round, white object traveling at a high speed in the northwest direction at Sandia Base, New Mexico on April 12, 1949.
interesting points: The object was a round white light appearing as though it followed a straight path., The observer noted the object covered an angular distance of 15 degrees in 8 seconds., The object disappeared suddenly as if its lights were extinguished., The observation lasted 8 seconds., The weather conditions were clear with no sound or odor associated with the object.
